title: Dinosaurs and Prime Numbers
description: ASIN B00APOHY96 moved to the most recent edition hereThere is a cow in Budleigh Salterton that is independent of the space-time continuum. Walton Cumberfield, however, does not know this. All he knows is that his dog is missing, his girlfriend has left him, and the local residential home has banned him from putting on any more toy-theatre productions. Somehow it is all connected... Somehow there is an answer â€“ and he is determined to find out what it is.Join Walton Cumberfield, amateur gas and electricity meter-reader, semi-professional scientist, poet, entrepreneur, inventor, raconteur and private detective as he embarks on a hilarious quest that will lead him to the discovery of a lifetime.
author: Tom  Moran
